message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. I believe you would greatly benefit from our exclusive product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its immense value to you, which you estimate at $12000, I am extending a special offer. For a limited time, you have the chance to acquire this product at a price reflecting its true worth and significance to you. My proposal is to sell it to you for $11500. This offer not only ensures you secure the product at a highly favorable rate but also allows me to maximize the value received for my offering. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.
